scenario_text.value:
My ears might be playing tricks on me.
I thought I heard something on the ceiling...

Hmm? Oh! I think your ears work just fine,
Takuma!
I hear something moving around up there, too!

...Thatâ€™s scary. Does that mean the enemy has
a way to move around up there?

No way! Does that mean it took Aoi all the
way up there?!

(We could be attacked from above, is that it?
How can we handle that?)
